name: Binaries or Noise
query: filetype.archive or filetype.binaries or filetype.font or filetype.image or filetype.*boilerplate or filetype.noise or size <= 0 or name contains -i README

name: Unchanged Non-Code Files
query: changes = 1 and not (filetype.java or filetype.scripts or filetype.javascript or filetype.typescript or filetype.jsp) and status.idle
